name: Dinosaur but Frog
description:
This is a recreation of the google dinosaur game, but with frogs. It also contains a high score counter and a speedometer. I do not own most of the images. There are more details inside the game. 

There are secret skins to be unlocked at certain point values

*This game's visuals are intentionally bad*

Antivirus software often detects python projects converted to exe as viruses due to the way that they are packaged. If this gets detected as a virus and you are using the Windows Defender antivirus, you just need to update Windows Defender, as I have gotten it removed from the virus list at Microsoft.
